greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square of triangular matrix A104445, read by rows, where X=A104445 satisfies: SHIFT_LEFT_UP(X) = X^2 - X + I.
comment: Column 0: T(n,0) = 1 + A091352(n-1) for n>0. Column 1 is A104447. Row sums form A104448.
formula: T(n, k) = A104445(n, k) + A104445(n+1, k+1) - I(n, k), where I=identity matrix. T(n, k) = A091351(n-1, k) + A091351(n, k+1) - I(n, k), for n>k>=0.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 08 2005
